member.name: M:Simple_POS.Form1.SearchProductByName(System.String)
member.summary: This function will search the array for a product based on part of the product name
member.param: The name of the product being searched
member.returns: The indexes of all products found or an empty array if nothing is found

member.name: M:Simple_POS.Form1.SearchProductById(System.String)
member.summary: This function will search the array for a product based on the id of the product
member.returns: The index of the found element on the product array or -1 if nothing is found

member.name: P:Simple_POS.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Simple_POS.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Simple_POS.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
